price: Kaya mag-abang ka sa Araw na magdadala ang langit ng isang usok na malinaw.
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
